channel.title: [pi] fixing autocasting with ancient staff glitch?
channel.description:
im on a pi base and there is a glitch were people can equip an ancient staff, select autocast barrage, then switch back to normal spell book...
which essentially allows them to barrage on normal spellbook which means they can stack tb and barrage....
and ideas on how to fix this?

item.title: [pi] fixing autocasting with ancient staff glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

maybe something along the lines of adding an if statement that checks if auto cast is selected and if a staff is equipped, and if it isn’t turn off auto casting.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] fixing autocasting with ancient staff glitch?
